description:
It was discovered that X.Org X Server incorrectly handled certain inputs.
An attacker could use these issues to cause the server to crash, resulting
in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

xwayland.description: X server for running X clients under Wayland
X server for running X clients under Wayland

title: X.Org X Server vulnerabilities
action:
After a standard system update you need to reboot your computer to make
all the necessary changes.
isummary: Several security issues were fixed in X.Org X Server.
